data.persona: I am an organist. I lead a very lucky life. I play the organ in a huge church. The Catholic church gives me money to live and a warm bed to sleep in.
data.description:
You are in the Pew.
The pew is worn from many years of being sat on during services.  It looks fairly basic upon first glance.  But there is something just under the surface, something moving.
There's an a holy book on a shelf underneath the seat, a pew, and a The pew here.
The priest is here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: steal a holy book on a shelf underneath the seat from priest

data.short_motivation: I need to read the holy book
data.mid_motivation: I need to know if there is more to life than playing the organ
data.long_motivation: I need make sure my soul goes to heaven
